title: Dear Girls Who Have Grown Up
alternative_title: Katsute Onnanoko Datta Hitotachi e ; かつて女の子だった人たちへ
status: Katsute Onnanoko Datta Hitotachi e ; かつて女の子だった人たちへ
description:
Description :
        "I want this man for myself." Nails, makeup, hair Remi, an office worker, doesn't slack off when it comes to investing in herself. The reason she's willing to go this far? To snag a man who's worthy of her, of course. One day, her childhood friend, Yumi, asks Remi to check out a man that she is interested in and introduces them. Much to her surprise, Takashi is ideal husband material, and the perfect high-caliber man that Remi has been looking for! She immediately decides that she'll make him hers, no matter what. And Takashi doesn't seem too put off by Remi flaunting her good looks his way What will come of this greedy love affair?! A collection of stories about girls and their lives now that they're all grown up.Katsute Onnanoko Datta Hitotachi e,
